item.title: Quantile Correlation Analysis Tool Implementation
item.description:
ðŸ”— SERIES

  • 1. Quantile Correlation Analysis Tool Implementation
  • 2. MODWT-Based Time Series Transformation and Visualization
  • 3. CIFAR-10 CNN Classification Practice
  • 4. Altcoin Price Prediction Based on WQC Image Analysis

SUMMARY

As an undergraduate researcher, I studied the background paper Testing the safe-haven properties of gold and bitcoin in the backdrop of COVID-19_A wavelet quantile correlation approach and implemented a mini project (research) to build a quantile correlation analysis tool.

GOAL

Implement algorithms for quantile covariance(qcov) and quantile correlation(qcor) calculation by Ï„(tau) using example data and visualize the results. (Reference paper: Quantile Correlations and Quantile Autoregressive Modeling)
